backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, bio inputs, alerts, dreams, rituals, and settings with access‑controlled CRUD operations and alert generation logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence manifest linking high‑level ritual and UI features to specific frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend pages, components, and hooks for navigation, rituals, chronicle, true‑time, dreams, and system utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining theme variables, light/dark modes, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for all pages including the BIOS‑TIME ritual and wraps the app with I18n and TTS providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing and error handling.
frontend/src/components/chronicle/Timeli: Renders chronicle entries with period badges, descriptions, and TTS controls in a vertical timeline layout.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Memory: Displays a daily memory anchor with date navigation, anchor content, and TTS controls inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/dreams/DreamEdit: Modal editor for creating or updating dream entries, storing them in localStorage with content, tags, and mood.
frontend/src/components/dreams/DreamList: Displays stored dream entries from localStorage with date, mood, tags, and allows selecting one for editing.
Overall application layout with header, footer, navigation, and an Outlet wrapped in an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/nav/PrimaryNav.t: Responsive primary navigation bar rendering route buttons with icons and mobile sheet navigation.
frontend/src/components/ritual-bios-time: Full‑screen ritual container applying themed gradients, mute/exit controls, and wrapping ritual content.
Displays temporary ritual notices as alert panels for audio, orientation, or vibration issues.
Interactive bloom screen using drag direction, audio, and vibration effects to select petals and trigger transitions.
Compass alignment screen using device heading, spatial audio, vibration feedback, and canvas animation to signal alignment.
Animated canvas showing pulsing oculus and orbiting glyphs with long‑press handling and status-based visuals.
frontend/src/components/rituals/RitualCh: Displays saved rituals, tracks daily completions via localStorage, and shows progress for the past 7 days.
frontend/src/components/rituals/RitualEd: Form for creating rituals with title, description, weekly schedule, and optional time, saving entries to localStorage.
frontend/src/components/sound/SoundThera: Sound therapy player with presets, duration control, safety notice gating, and playback controls via a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorBoun: React error boundary that catches render errors and shows a reload prompt with optional error message.
frontend/src/components/system/NonBlocki: Dismissible inline error alert component with customizable title and message.
frontend/src/components/system/RouteErro: Full-page error display for route-level failures with reload option and optional error text.
frontend/src/components/true-time/Analem: Canvas visualization of the solar analemma with scaled points, date marker, and emblem overlay.
frontend/src/components/true-time/Equati: Displays the Equation of Time for a selected date, with navigation buttons, formatted date output, and explanatory text.
frontend/src/components/true-time/Horizo: Renders a canvas-based horizon dial showing day phases, markers, and current time position using a live ticker.
Provides play, pause, resume, and stop controls for text-to-speech playback using the browser's SpeechSynthesis API.
frontend/src/components/vortex/VortexMod: Implements an ultradian cycle focus timer with selectable cycle length, phase display, and upcoming zenith/nadir times.
frontend/src/content/ethicsPrinciples.ts: Exports a list of ethics principles outlining data privacy, guidance philosophy, and human-centered design values.
frontend/src/data/chronicleEntries.ts: Defines a chronological list of Holocene-era historical entries with period labels, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/data/memoryAnchors.ts: Provides date-based memory anchor texts and a lookup function returning historical context for specific calendar days.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCompassSpatialAudi: Creates and manages a spatial sine‑wave oscillator that adjusts volume and stereo panning based on alignment state.
frontend/src/hooks/useDayPhasePalette.ts: Determines day phase from current hour and exposes a matching color palette that updates every minute.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context-driven Internet Identity auth handling, including login, stored identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useLandscapeTrigger.t: Detects whether the device is in landscape orientation using matchMedia with support for legacy and modern browsers.
frontend/src/hooks/useLongPress.ts: Implements long‑press detection with a timeout and exposes pointer event handlers.
frontend/src/hooks/useNowTicker.ts: Returns a Date value that updates at a specified interval via setInterval.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrientationOrSimul: Provides device heading data using DeviceOrientation when available, falling back to a simulated heading when unsupported.
Tracks pointer drag direction once movement exceeds a threshold and exposes drag lifecycle handlers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in react‑query hooks for fetching and mutating user data, alerts, dreams, rituals, and settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useRitualAudio.ts: Generates a harmonic pad using multiple oscillators and manages audio playback state.
frontend/src/hooks/useSoundTherapy.ts: Controls timed sine‑wave sound therapy sessions with start, pause, and stop functions.
Offers a simple wrapper around navigator.vibrate with support detection and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useVortexTimer.ts: Custom hook managing a two-phase focus/release timer with start/stop controls and interval-based countdown.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables, parchment styling, and ritual-specific UI classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/BiosTimeRitualPage.ts: Controls state transitions between Souffle, Bloom, and Boussole ritual screens, reacting to device orientation.
frontend/src/pages/ChroniclePage.tsx: Displays the Holocene Chronicle with a header, disclaimer alert, and timeline component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard handling user auth state, profile setup dialog, date display, and navigation to rituals.
frontend/src/pages/DreamJournalPage.tsx: Dream journal interface with editor and list components for creating and editing dream entries.
frontend/src/pages/EthicsDisclaimersPage: Shows medical, privacy, and content disclaimers plus ethical principles with optional text‑to‑speech.
frontend/src/pages/RitualsPage.tsx: Provides tabs for Vortex focus module and personal ritual tools including editor and checklist.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: A settings UI allowing users to change language, date display, privacy sync, TTS, and export local data.
frontend/src/pages/TrueTimePage.tsx: Page displaying Horizon Dial, Analemma, and Equation of Time visualizations with tab navigation.
frontend/src/state/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides i18n context storing UI language and translate function using saved preferences.
frontend/src/state/i18n/strings.ts: Defines translation keys and English/French string mappings for UI text.
frontend/src/state/i18n/useI18n.ts: Exports a hook that returns the i18n context.
frontend/src/state/preferences/dateDispl: Stores and retrieves the chosen HE/Gregorian date display preference from localStorage.
frontend/src/state/preferences/privacySe: Manages a syncEnabled privacy setting persisted in localStorage.
frontend/src/state/preferences/soundSafe: Tracks whether the user acknowledged the sound safety notice via localStorage.
frontend/src/state/preferences/ttsSettin: Gets and sets whether TTS is enabled, saved in localStorage.
frontend/src/state/preferences/uiLanguag: Handles UI language preference with browser-language fallback and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/state/tts/TtsProvider.tsx: Provides TTS support state, persistence, and feature detection via context.
frontend/src/utils/astronomy/analemmaMod: Generates analemma coordinate points using EOT and solar declination formulas.
frontend/src/utils/astronomy/equationOfT: Computes equation of time for a given date using an approximate formula.
frontend/src/utils/audio/soundTherapyPre: Defines sound therapy preset lists with frequencies and descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/dates/dayKey.ts: Utility functions for day-of-year calculation and date offsetting.
frontend/src/utils/dates/holocene.ts: Converts dates to Holocene Era and formats them based on display preference.
frontend/src/utils/export/exportJson.ts: Exports app data (dreams, rituals, completions) from localStorage as a JSON file.
frontend/src/utils/time/releaseMoments.t: Calculates the next zenith or nadir moment relative to the current time.
frontend/src/utils/tts/speechSynthesis.t: Provides speech synthesis support checks and a controller for speaking, pausing, and stopping TTS.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL and hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from the hash without reload.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for the project's design system.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, goals, required features, assets, and known issues for building the BIOS‑TIME ritual web prototype.
